name: Hierocoder
description:
You are a server-acolyte of the hierarchy, the chosen minority who are allowed to view and work with code. Today you are called out from your training by your supervisor, and tasked to focus your productivity on a new strange task.

In hierocoder you can simply remain productive and stick to your work,  or you can uncover the truth behind the existence of the divine member, the holy spaceship of the Bezozian doctrine that determines the once a year day-off of every member of your society.

Coded and created in five days for the 2021 Intercampus game jam hosted by the University of the Witwatersrand and Vega in South Africa.

Created by Jack Rathbone.

*Featuring day 0 patch to fix a UI bug, all the hail the great job creator and stay productive*
